text: Gerward was Bishop of Poznan about 1187 though his exact Name and date are unsure.Karol Maleczyński: Studia nad dokumentem polskim, Wrocław 1971, p253. A number of persons are believed to have been Bishop following the tenure of Arnold, including Piotr Łabędź and Świętosław. ==References== Category:Bishops of Poznań Category:12th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown
title: Gerward (Bishop of Poznan)
